nodes.text: Blackwater Systems facility, owned and operated by Blackwater Systems corporation (established by Granta Omega), was a factory that manufactured and tested the Jenna Zan Arbor-created drug, the Zone of Self-Containment.

Constructed of black durasteel and stone, and described as consisting of a main hulking building with a wing flung out from one side like a useless arm, the secret, windowless facility was located in the Yellow District of the planet Falleen's capital city, Falleen Throne. Situated beyond the city's outskirts on frigid, windswept plains, it was two kilometers from the nearest cloud-bus stop.
This facility featured in the young adult novel Jedi Quest: The False Peace, written by Jude Watson and published in July 2004.
